Key Match Events: The Warriors won by a score of 125-112 to improve to 6-1 in their first seven games.
Poole finished the loss with 24 points, one rebound, three assists, three steals and four blocks while shooting 8/20 from the field and 2/10 from the three-point range in 34 minutes.
Post-Match Reflections: Curry expressed support for his former teammate Jordan Poole, saying he's playing better than last year and has the potential to make something out of his opportunity with the Wizards.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Warriors will resume action on Wednesday when they host the Boston Celtics.
The Wizards will play their next game on Friday when they visit Ja Morant and the Memphis Grizzlies.
Others: After spending the first four seasons of his career with the Warriors, Poole was traded to the Wizards during the 2023 offseason.
